Demonstrator

A mobile and user-friendly power analyzer

Report Documentation

About the Demonstrator

The Demonstrator generates seven different supply voltages and is able to measure the voltage and current on four different channels.

Thanks to 12'000mAh battery, the device can easily be used for several hours without charging

Modular Design

The Demonstrator offers a REST-API and creates a local Hotspot.

Thank to this setup, any device can connect to it and custom APPs can be developed

Cross Platform

Simply connect your device to the Demonstrator's WIFI and open your browser to see measurements in real time

Secure UI

The demonstrator's settings can be locked with a pincode.

Thus it can be used for conventions or conferences without supervision

Documentation

Thanks to the modular structure, the Demonstrator can easily be further improved.

Frontend

The frontend is build entirely on Angular and is written in TypeScript

Check out the Documentation

Backend

The backend is written entirely in Python and runs on a Raspberry Pi

Check out the Documentation
